creditline: Lent by Janet and Gary Christenson
description: snow covered street and buildings; three figures in street; matted
text: Saito_ designed this print as a note card, which was originally sold in a boxed set of twelve designs (with an additional print affixed to the box's cover). Saito_ was from Aizu and produced many images of his hometown. Here, however, he departs from more typical idealized views of Japan popular at the time by showing mundane details of modern life such as the telephone poles and tire tracks.
title: Winter in Aizu
